title: Tilapia consumption patterns and consumer preferences: Predictors and perspectives of consumers in Ghana
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Anthonia Helga Andoh-Odoom, Kwabena Asiedu Bugyei, Amy Atter, Vincent Owusu Kyei-Baffour, Angela Parry-Hanson Kunadu, Firibu Kwesi Saalia, Mary Anti Chama, Youngsun Lee, Hanna Maarit Koivula, Wisdom Kofi Amoa-Awua, Seth Koranteng Agyakwah
